english: to be at odds with sth. (idiom)
to put A at odds with B (idiom)
He's at odds with his friend.
german: Er streitet sich mit seinem Freund.

english: to be at odds with oneself and the world (idiom)
german: in Hader mit sichDat. und der Welt leben (geh, Redewendung)

english: to be at odds with sb. (on / over sth.) (idiom)
to be at odds with sb. (on / over sth.) (idiom)
german: mit jdm. in etw.Dat. nicht einig gehen

english: to be at odds with the truth (idiom)
to be at serious odds with sb. (idiom)
